body:
So apparently the knockback is going to be fixed with the next update. Opinions? 

Imo, it's going to seperate the good PvPers from the people who kb abuse because you can actually preform normal combos and use normal kb techniques. It forces people to learn how to PvP better and not abuse kb, use wierd kb tactics, etc. 

It also removes those moments where you hit someone 3 times on a bridge, they stay on, but when you hit them once they barely move, w/o beaner ping ( which is when you have 80-150ms usually, which causes you to take almost no kb). 

I will admit though...It was fun abusing the wonky kb xD
